content: That's really helpful, thanks! I've been using a lot of baking soda and vinegar in my DIY cleaning products, and it's amazing how effective they are. I've also been trying to reduce my use of paper towels by using reusable cloth towels instead. Do you have any recommendations for eco-friendly laundry detergents? I recently switched to a brand called "Seventh Generation" and I'm loving the results so far.
